name: CRECombinationTestsThatIncludeEnterobacteralesByCultureAndIdentification
title: CRE (Combination Tests that include Enterobacterales by Culture and Identification)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Enterobacterales species in a culture in combination with another organism.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Combination codes for Enterobacterales species),(Exclusion Criteria: LOINC codes for only Enterobacterales)
